overview: The high temperatures radiated between Colt men have finally been captured on film. This Buckshot Productions compilation features 10 complete films, including: "The Love Tub" with Moose and Bob Randall, "Hawaiian Heat" with Rick Wolfmier and Mike Betts, "Gunner & Killer" with Gunner Hyde and Killer Joe, "Saturday Afternoon Fever" with Van Roberts, Josh and Nick Rodgers, "The Best Laid Plans" with Mike Davis, Josh and Werner Robles, "Driveshaft" with Mike Davis and Lloyd Kasper, "Three Is A Dream" with Todd Baron, J.W. King and Loren Marks, "Alter Ego" with Stutz, "Alley Cats" with  Loren Marks and Beau Matthews, and "Not So Straight" with Gunner Hyde and Giorgio Canali.
title: Man-To-Man Heat!
